tool_description: Simple YouTube Rapid API provides an accurate and up-to-date Youtube channel subscriber count.
name: Simple Youtube
title: Simple Youtube

api_list.name: Youtube Channel Subscribers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-youtube.p.rapidapi.com/channel/subscribers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-youtube.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-youtube.p.rapidapi.com/channel/subscribers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-youtube.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
